function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Physical store crowding and safety management","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded physical stores","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies and safety protocols","Technologies":"In-store analytics, automated checkout systems","People":"Customers, staff, and other visitors to the store","Owner":"Retailers and store management"},{"Description":"Inadequate sensory appeals and social presence for online retailers","Impact":"Reduced customer engagement and brand loyalty for online retailers","Mitigation":"Invest in sensory marketing, social media engagement, and virtual experiences","Technologies":"Virtual reality, social media platforms, sensory marketing tools","People":"Online customers and social media followers","Owner":"Online retailers and marketing teams"}]}
